item.description:
Edit: 05/30/12: Jeff is streaming live throughout the meeting at http://www.justin.tv/infowarrior991/ and uploading videos at http://www.youtube.com/user/Infowarrior991/.

(The Event is not open to the public, if you look at the past attendees you'll find out why)

The globalist criminals from David Rockefeller, to Henry Kissinger, Zbigniew Brzezinski; by chairmen of 100 of the most powerful corporations including Presidents of The Fed, IMF & World Bank, American Senators, Vice Presidents of The United States, the CEO's of the leading newspapers & editors former heads of the CIA and heads of state from around the world will meet in Virginia and yet the media doesn't cover this meeting. Join us as Patriots and Infowarriors out to Chantilly, Virginia to send a message to the globalists that the media blackout is over.

Contact me on my cell phone (860) 301-9665 or Twitter @Infowarrior991 if you have any questions. More information will come on a time or whether to find a spot to get together and all drive to Virginia.

The location of Bilderberg 2012:
Westfields Marriott Washington Dulles
14750 Conference Center Drive
Chantilly, VA 20151
(703) 818-0300

The closest hotel is 5 minutes away.
Hyatt Place Chantilly/Dulles Airport-South
4994 Westone Plaza
Chantilly, VA 20151
(703) 459-9675
hyatt.com

P.S Alex Jones will be there along with Veteran Journalist Jim Tucker.

http://www.infowars.com/secretive-bilderberg-group-set-to-meet-in-virginia-may-31st-june-3rd/

Jim Tucker confirming the location of Bilderberg 2012:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Fr5ZUqCXSnk
item.name: Occupy Bilderberg 2012
